tool_description: Extracts text content from document images using optical character recognition, with support for multiple languages and specialized legal document formatting.

image_file_path.description: Path to the image file for text extraction

language_codes.description: ISO language codes for OCR recognition (e.g., eng, spa, fra)

preserve_formatting.description: Maintain original document layout and formatting in extracted text

confidence_threshold.description: Minimum confidence score (0-100) for character recognition

error_messages: Image file not found: The specified image_file_path does not exist. Verify the file path is correct.
Unsupported language code: One or more language codes are not supported. Use valid ISO language codes.
Confidence threshold invalid: confidence_threshold must be between 0 and 100. Adjust to a valid range.
OCR processing failed: Text extraction failed due to image quality or format issues. Try enhancing the image first.
usage: Provide the image_file_path for text extraction. Specify language_codes for multilingual documents, set preserve_formatting to maintain layout, and adjust confidence_threshold for quality control. Returns extracted text with confidence metrics.

extracted_text.description: Full text content extracted from the document image

average_confidence.description: Average confidence score (0-100) for the entire text extraction

word_count.description: Total number of words successfully extracted

page_count.description: Number of pages processed in the document

low_confidence_regions.description: Text portions that fell below the confidence threshold
